The image was also shared on Twitter and: 3. Alt News performed a reverse image search on Google and found that the viral image was actually published by Maldito Feminismo, a Spain-based fact-checking platform, on December 31, 2019. The report stated that the person who jumped off the building was a woman, not a young boy, and the incident was unrelated to the coronavirus.
The incident was also fact: checked by Spanish website Newtral, which confirmed that the images were recorded in 2019 and had no connection to the coronavirus.
